title: A Disney Christmas gift
brief_description: Presenting a gift-wrapped collection of Christmas treasures - favourite holiday scenes from Walt Disney’s best loved animated classics and cartoons. Join Mickey Mouse and his friends, and enjoy some of the brightest, most colourful moments on film, like Bambi and Thumper frolicking in the snow, and magical moments with Cinderella and her fairy godmother! From snowflakes and sleigh bells to Christmas toys and merry wishes, this is a very special gift, a glittering package spilling over with Yuletide fun.
